ygData.subject: RE: possible big cheat for EQ....
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t want to see any hacks come from this, but the ability to use other programs like ICQ would be great. To the programmers out there, could a .VxD driver
ygData.messageBody:
I don't want to see any hacks come from this, but
the ability to use other programs like ICQ would be
great.

To the programmers out there, could a .VxD driver be
written to satisfy EQ while allowing you to Alt-Tab
out?

Belgarth

--- "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...> wrote:
> From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
>
> Damn...was hoping something might come of this. I
> think you COULD make alot
> of cheats if you could do this, but it would be such
> a odd setup that 98% of
> the people wouldn't do it, so it wouldn't cause alot
> of ruckus... Oh well...
>
> People! Feel free to keep experimenting!! Maybe
> someone can find a setup or
> a way to get to that other side. I'd love to be able
> to cruise the web or
> ICQ or email while I'm medding and healing up!
>
